pinyin: Ai1 wen2 he2 pan4 Si1 te4 la1 te4 fu2

sentences.english: At sur-rhone, north Durance River and the confluence rhone 4 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 在羅訥河畔，南距迪朗斯河和羅訥河匯合處4公里。

sentences.english: A: There’s a big sale on clothes and sporting goods at Riverside Mall.
sentences.chinese: 河畔購物中心的衣服和運動器材大減價。

sentences.english: Hampton Court Palace in the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames. (Jason Hawkes)
sentences.chinese: 漢普敦皇宮，泰晤士河畔里士滿，倫敦。

sentences.english: On riverbanks capy baras the world's largest rodents snooze.
sentences.chinese: 在河畔，水豚，全世界最大的齧齒類動物，正在打盹。

sentences.english: Walking along the bank of Danube, enjoying the relaxing life of Hungary.
sentences.chinese: 徜徉在藍色多瑙河畔，盡享匈牙利的奢侈慢生活。

sentences.english: Hebei-Shandong-Henan border revolutionary memorial hall is located in Heze city near the Zhao Wang river.
sentences.chinese: 冀魯豫邊區革命紀念館位於菏澤市城區趙王河畔。

sentences.english: A city of northeast India on the Hooghly River north of Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 印度東北部一城市，位於加爾各答以北的胡格利河畔。

sentences.english: A city of east-central Germany on the Elbe River east-southeast of Leipzig.
sentences.chinese: 德累斯頓德國中東部城市，位於萊比錫東南偏東河畔。

sentences.english: Lived in Riverside County manor, L. A… But I just moved several days ago.
sentences.chinese: 生長在羅省河畔縣的一家莊園裏，不過我剛剛搬遷了。

sentences.english: The company is next to North Train Station, the bank of beautiful Funnan River.
sentences.chinese: 公司靠近火車北站附近，美麗的府南河畔。

sentences.english: There is always someone indulging in the romance of River Seine.
sentences.chinese: 總有人傾心於那塞納河畔中源遠流淌的浪漫人文風情。
貝加河，河畔的靈魂牛仔。

sentences.english: A city of northern France, a residential and industrial suburb of Paris on the Seine River.
sentences.chinese: 法國北部的一座城市，位於塞納河畔。

sentences.english: It was pleasant to take a photo by the side of the Thames in Wandsworth, London.
sentences.chinese: 在倫敦溫斯和輔泰晤士河畔留影，一樂也。

definition: Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
